name: Spores & Suffocation
description:
CNs: death, drug use, depression, flashing lights, self harm

*"Delay = the sound of a repeating, decaying echo"*

Strange sounds and even stranger spores pulsate through a broken space ship, while a fearless marine wakes up distraught. 

What happened? Why is nobody doing anything? And what is the meaning of death?

Solve the never ending mysteries in this atmospheric sci-fi point and click adventure game.

But beware! It seems to become a fight against time, as the oxygen levels get lower and lower and

*"Delay = the sound of a repeating, decaying echo"*

Strange sounds and even stranger spores seem eerily familiar, as the space marine wakes up again...

Walk through a destroyed Space Ship with A & D.

Interact with objects and characters by clicking on them.

Carry Items in your inventory and combine them in the integrated crafting space.

Try to survive and puzzle with a limited amount of oxygen!

Good luck.

Team:

Ivan – Lead Design, Programming

Robert – Music & Sound, Programming

Andreas – Character Design, Set Design

Paula – Story, Puzzle Design, VO

Game made within  72 hours for LD 50
